statements.query: MATCH  (n:GitLabDependency)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(:GitLabProject)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GitLabGroup{id: $GITLAB_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})  WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:GitLabDependency)-[r:DEPENDS_ON]->(:GitLabProject)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GitLabGroup{id: $GITLAB_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
